document.title: Hello World â€” MDX
document.description: An example MDX post rendered via Contentlayer.

body.raw:
export const Note = () => (
Inline React component inside MDX.
) # Hello, MDX ðŸ‘‹ This is an example blog post written in MDX and indexed automatically by Contentlayer. - Statically rendered with Next.js App Router. - Frontmatter powers the index and metadata. - Supports GitHub-flavored markdown (tables, task lists) and slugs. ```tsx export default function Example() { return
Code blocks are highlighted by your theme.
} ```

document.title: Motion and Micro-Interactions That Feel Right
document.description: Balancing delight and performance with Framer Motion and CSS.

body.raw: Motion gives users feedback and hierarchy. Keep durations short and ease-out on entry.
body.code:

document.title: Optimizing Images in Next.js
document.description: Practical tips for image optimization with next/image and modern formats.

body.raw:
Next.js ships with a first-class `<Image />` component that makes optimization easier.

- Prefer AVIF or WebP where supported.
- Always provide `width` and `height`.
- Use `fill` responsibly with a parent that has known dimensions.
